text: The Campaign is a 2012 American political satire comedy movie directed by Jay Roach, written by Shawn Harwell and Chris Henchy. It stars Will Ferrell and Zach Galifianakis as two North Carolinians trying to win a seat in the Congress. The movie was released on August 10, 2012 to mixed reviews. ==References== Category:2012 movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies
title: The Campaign (movie)
